message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. For this unique opportunity, I propose a price of $150. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
